1)"
Population mean of all movies upto 2015 = "6.41799544419134"                          
"Z at alpha = 0.05 " "-1.64485362695147" 
"Z known variance = " "-0.157261841753863" 
"Z unknown variance = " "-0.142723454651245"
Hence we accept the hypothesis that popularity of films increases with year since z known and z unknown are greater than z alpha
2)"Correlation coefficient is equal to -0.759674658430108"
"Since r < 0 , correlation that exists is negative"
"r^2 =  0.577105586660901"
"From gam plot,we can see that it is non linear correlation"
3)          [,1]      [,2]      [,3]      [,4]

[3,] 0.3162701 0.2507474 1.0000000 0.9323154
[4,] 0.2750969 0.2787345 0.9323154 1.0000000
#By analysing the last column which gives correlation of  Overtime Pay, Other Pay and benefits with basic pay,we can see that they have a positive correlation.Hence they increase with basic pay
